text.title: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion

head.s: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion

p.s: Since the advent of the personal computer and network technology , genealogy research by family members has become an addictive pastime that has contributed to many happy family reunions .
But what if you were asked to organize the next event ?
Should you hire a family reunion planner , form a reunion committee or do it all yourself ?

item.s: Ask for other family members to help with planning activities and choosing the time and place .
Get the word out - let others know you 're planning a family reunion event .
Give family members plenty of notice .
Usually three or four months advance notice will allow attendees to plan vacation time or make adjustments in scheduling .

figure.rend: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion Step 01.jpg

item.s: Assign each member of your newly formed reunion committee a specific task .

This could be tasks such as T-shirts and memorabilia , genealogy presentations including memorials and historic tours , entertainment , dining events , Reunion Book , entertainment , photography , etc.

figure.rend: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion Step 02.jpg

item.s: Give each member written instructions regarding how to execute his or her task .
Create a time line reminder .
Make good use of Family Reunion Planner organizers that feature schedulers and time line reminders .
Make use of Event Planning Software with editable worksheets and templates .

figure.rend: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion Step 03.jpg

item.s: Schedule the next meeting one or two months away and follow up on all action items .
Keep the lines of communication wide open .

figure.rend: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion Step 04.jpg

item.s: Hold each person responsible for their assignment .

figure.rend: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion Step 05.jpg

item.s: Decide some of the main things that will occur at the reunion .
For example , you may wish to honor the elders and accomplished members of the family , acknowledge those who are going through something , etc.
Be sure to encourage each other .

figure.rend: Plan and Organize a Family Reunion Step 06.jpg

item.s: During the gathering have food and drink available .
Share stories and anecdotes .
Do n't gossip or spread rumors ; keep everything positive and friendly .
Bring lots , and lots of love .
Even for people you usually clash with !
There are many family reunion planning tools online .

Make use of planning material that features the following : a time line , preparation reminders , scheduling worksheets , committee assignment sheets , reunion needs lists , meal planners and checklists and T-Shirt Rosters .
There are many ways to do your family reunion on the cheap .
You can get free stuff from your local Chamber of Commerce , museums and tourist centers , find free spots to congregate at universities , and get free invitations and eCards online .
You might like to consider holding a small family gathering to plan and organize a committee for starting annual or regular family reunions .
It depends on how much effort you wish to put in .
Do n't settle for services simply because they are cheap and local .
Get recommendations from folks who do not stand to profit .
Do n't procrastinate .
Delegate tasks according to skill and competence .
